programme.title: International Tour
programme.desc: It’s a special international edition of Monster Jam from London Stadium. See the highly anticipated debut of the four Marvel Monster Jam trucks Thor, Ironman, Spider-Man, and Black Panther. See them go head-to-head against MaxD, Grave Digger, El Toro Loco, and Megalodon for the Overall Event Championship.

programme.desc: The superstars of Monster Jam have come to North Florida at the Alltel Stadium in Jacksonville for some racing action.

programme.desc: Monster Jam's 2020 season continues with a visit to Lucas Oil Stadium in Indianapolis, Indiana. The event was the 5th on Stadium Championship Series Red!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: The Dome at America's Center - St. Louis, MO
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series Red returns to St. Louis for round 4 of 26. Only 3 points separate Bakugan Dragonoid’s Camden Murphy from Grave Digger’s Adam Anderson. Will truck gremlins continue to plague Anderson and can Murphy get his second consecutive Event Championship?

programme.title: Arena in 30
programme.desc: Arena Championship Series Central takes moves into the Ford Center in downtown Evansville, Indiana for the series finale featuring the return of Monster Jam legend, Jon Zimmer Sr. in Wild Side. Grave Digger’s Brandon Vinson looks to end the season with another championship before competing at World Finals XXII in Nashville.
